fi.harism.curl

Interface CurlRenderer.Observer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CurlView
    Enclosing class:
    CurlRenderer

    public static interface CurlRenderer.Observer
    Observer for waiting render engine/state updates.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDrawFrame()
      Called from onDrawFrame called before rendering is started.
      void onPageSizeChanged(int width, int height)
      Called once page size is changed.
      void onSurfaceCreated()
      Called from onSurfaceCreated to enable texture re-initialization etc what needs to be done when this happens.

    • Method Detail

      • onDrawFrame

        void onDrawFrame()
        Called from onDrawFrame called before rendering is started. This is intended to be used for animation purposes.

      • onPageSizeChanged

        void onPageSizeChanged(int width,
                     int height)
        Called once page size is changed. Width and height tell the page size in pixels making it possible to update textures accordingly.

      • onSurfaceCreated

        void onSurfaceCreated()
        Called from onSurfaceCreated to enable texture re-initialization etc what needs to be done when this happens.
